name: RandomQuotes
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random quotes
des:
Yaayy!! I can give you quotes from famous people, or well maybe not so famous people(but good ones though). I could display the same in your Echo Show Display or Echo Spot Display too.

A great pool of quotes are made available and is updated on a weekly basis. Some of them are, maybe not so well known quotes but are fun to hear.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
